00048 
00049 uvm_ml_packer::uvm_ml_packer() {
00050   uvm_packer::use_metadata(true);
00051 }
00052 
00053 uvm_ml_packer::~uvm_ml_packer() { }
00054 
00055 bool uvm_ml_packer::use_metadata() const {
00056   return uvm_packer::use_metadata();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void uvm_ml_packer::use_metadata(bool b) {
00060   if (!b) {
00061     cerr << "WARNING: uvm_ml_packer use_metadata must be true. " 
00062       << "Ignoring attempt to set it to false" << endl;
00063     return;
00064   }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void uvm_ml_packer::set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
00068   set_size(v->size/32);
00069   int size = get_size();
00070   sc_bv_base btmp(size);
00071   int nwords = btmp.size(); // # words that will fit in size bits
00072   sc_bv_base* bv = get_packed_bits();
00073   for (int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) {
00074     bv->set_word(i, *(v->val + i));
00075   }
00076   set_pack_index(nwords);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void uvm_ml_packer::fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
00080   v->size = get_pack_index() * 32;
00081   sc_bv_base* bv = get_packed_bits();
00082   int size = get_size();
00083   sc_bv_base btmp(size);
00084   int bsize = btmp.size(); // # words that will fit in size bits
00085 
00086   // this mlupo is going over to backplane and then onto SV adaptor;
00087   // the SV adaptor is hardcoded to accept the max bits, hence allocate
00088   // max words here
00089 
00090   static int nwords = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words();
00091 
00092   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(v, nwords);
00093 
00094   for (int i = 0; i < bsize; i++) {
00095     *(v->val + i) = bv->get_word(i);
00096   }
00097 }

00108 // NOTE: unlimited max size 
00109 // memory is allocated dynamically in chunks of 
00110 // unsigned(UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT)

00115 // CLASS: ml_uvm_packer_rep_int

00117 // Internal implementation class.
00118 // uvm_packer delegetates to this class to do the real work.

00121 
00127 class ml_uvm_packer_rep_int {
00128 public:
00129   ml_uvm_packer_rep_int(uvm_packer* packer);
00130   ~ml_uvm_packer_rep_int();
00131   //
00132   void allocate(int nwords, bool copy = true);
00133   void reset();
00134   void set_bits(unsigned* bits, unsigned nbits);
00135   //
00136   bool use_metadata() const { return m_use_metadata; }
00137   void use_metadata(bool b) { m_use_metadata = b; }
00138   //
00139   void check_size(int nwords);
00140   //
00141   void pack_non_null();
00142   bool unpack_non_null();
00143   void pack_null();
00144   //
00145   void pack_char(char);
00146   void unpack_char(char&);
00147   //
00148   void pack_string(std::string s);
00149   void unpack_string(std::string& s);
00150   //
00151   void pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name);
00152   void * unpack_obj_header();
00153   uvm_object * unpack_uvm_obj_header();
00154   void pack_obj(uvm_object*);
00155   void unpack_obj(uvm_object*&);
00156   //
00157   void pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic&);
00158   void unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic&);
00159   void pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base&);
00160   void unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base&);
00161   void pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base&);
00162   void unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base&);
00163   void pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base&);
00164   void unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base&);
00165   void pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base&);
00166   void unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base&);
00167   void pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed&);
00168   void unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed&);
00169   void pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned&);
00170   void unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned&);
00171   //
00172   unsigned get_remaining_unpacked_bits() { return (pack_index - unpack_index) * 32; }
00173   unsigned* get_packed_bits() { return m_bits; }
00174   int get_pack_index() const { return pack_index; }
00175   void inc_unpack_index(int n);
00176   uvm_packer* m_packer;
00177   bool m_use_metadata;
00178   unsigned pack_index;
00179   unsigned unpack_index;
00180 
00181   unsigned* m_bits;
00182   unsigned size;
00183   unsigned max_size;
00184 };

00187 
00188 template<typename T>
00189 void pack_unsigned(const T& a, uvm_ml_packer_rep_int* rep) {
00190   unsigned nwords = (sizeof(T)*8 - 1)/32 + 1;
00191   rep->check_size(nwords);
00192   memcpy(&(rep->m_bits[rep->pack_index]), &a, sizeof(T));
00193   rep->pack_index+= nwords;
00194 }
00195 
00196 template<typename T>
00197 void unpack_unsigned(T& a, uvm_ml_packer_rep_int* rep) {
00198   unsigned nwords = (sizeof(T)*8 - 1)/32 + 1;
00199   memcpy(&a, &(rep->m_bits[rep->unpack_index]), sizeof(T));
00200   rep->inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00201 }
00202 
00203 static sc_strhash<void*> name_id_dict;
00204 static sc_phash<void*, std::string*> id_name_dict;
00205 
00206 unsigned uvm_get_type_id(std::string name) {
00207   char* c = (char*)(name.c_str());
00208   unsigned id = 0;
00209   void* pid = 0;
00210   if (name_id_dict.contains(c)) {
00211     pid = name_id_dict[c];
00212     id = (unsigned)(unsigned long)(pid);
00213     return id;
00214   }
00215   // not in dict
00216   id = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_type_id(name);
00217   pid = (void*)(unsigned long)(id);
00218   name_id_dict.insert(c, pid);
00219   return id;
00220 }
00221 
00222 std::string uvm_get_type_name(unsigned id) {
00223   std::string *name = 0;
00224   void* pid;
00225   // need to do the cast to unsigned long below before casting to pointer
00226   // because on 64 bit m/cs pointers are 64 bits, whereas unsigned is 32
00227   // bits; so casting from unsigned to pointer generates compiler warning;
00228   // unsigend long  matches the size of pointers on 32 bit and 64 bit m/cs
00229   pid = (void *)(unsigned long)id;
00230     name = id_name_dict[pid];
00231     if (name != 0) {
00232     return *name;
00233   }
00234   // not in dict
00235   char* nm = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_type_name(id);
00236   name = new std::string(nm); 
00237   id_name_dict.insert(pid, name);
00238   return *name;
00239 }

00244 
00245 ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::ml_uvm_packer_rep_int(uvm_packer* packer) {
00246   m_packer = packer;
00247   m_use_metadata = false;
00248 
00249   pack_index = 0;
00250   unpack_index = 0;
00251 
00252   size = 0;
00253   max_size = 0;
00254   m_bits = 0;
00255 }
00256 
00257 ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::~ml_uvm_packer_rep_int() {
00258   if (m_bits)
00259     delete[] m_bits;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::allocate(int nwords, bool copy_) {
00263   // allocate new unsigned array with new size, and copy over contents from
00264   // old unsigned array
00265 
00266   unsigned total_elems = pack_index + nwords;
00267   unsigned old_size = size;
00268   size = ((total_elems - 1)/UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT + 1)*UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT; 
00269   // the calculation above is simply adding a chunk of 
00270   // UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT elements to the existing 
00271   // size; instead of doing that directly, we go thru the calcualtions in case 
00272   // (nwords > UVM_ML_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE_INT), in which case more 
00273   // than 1 chunk will be added;
00274   
00275   if (size > max_size) { // need to allocate
00276     max_size = size;
00277     unsigned* new_bv = new unsigned[size];
00278     if (m_bits) {
00279       if (copy_) {
00280         memcpy(new_bv, m_bits, old_size*(sizeof(unsigned)));
00281       }
00282       delete[] m_bits;
00283     }
00284     m_bits = new_bv;
00285     return;
00286   }
00287 }
00288   
00289 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::set_bits(unsigned* bits, unsigned nbits) {
00290 
00291     unsigned nwords = nbits/32;
00292   // check that we are in a "fresh" packer, e.g. one that has been reset
00293 
00294     ASSERT_ZERO(size);
00295     ASSERT_ZERO(pack_index);
00296   // no need to copy over from old sc_bv_base
00297   allocate(nwords, false);  
00298   memcpy(m_bits, bits, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
00299   size = nwords;
00300   pack_index = nwords;
00301 }
00302 
00303 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::reset() {
00304 
00305   pack_index = 0;
00306   unpack_index = 0;
00307   size = 0;
00308 }
00309 
00310 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::inc_unpack_index(int n) {
00311   unpack_index += n;
00312   if (unpack_index > pack_index) {
00313     char msg[1024];
00314     sprintf(msg,"unpack_index=%d, pack_index=%d",unpack_index,pack_index);
00315     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_,msg);
00316   }
00317 }
00318 
00320 
00321 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::check_size(int nwords) {
00322   int capacity = size - pack_index;
00323   if (nwords >= capacity) {
00324     allocate(nwords);
00325   }
00326 }
00327 
00328 // put a 8-bit 1 meaning non-null for uvm_objects
00329 
00330 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_non_null() {
00331   int i = 1;
00332   pack_unsigned(i, this);
00333   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_non_null " << endl;
00334 }
00335 
00336 // put 8-bit 0 meaning null for uvm_objects
00337 
00338 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_null() {
00339   int i = 0;
00340   pack_unsigned(i, this);
00341   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_null " << endl;
00342 }
00343 
00344 bool ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null() {
00345   int a;
00346   unpack_unsigned(a, this);
00347   if (!a) { 
00348     if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null FALSE " << endl;
00349     return false;
00350   }
00351   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_non_null true " << endl;
00352   return true;
00353 }
00354 
00356 
00357 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_char(char a) {
00358   pack_unsigned(a, this);
00359   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_char " << a << endl;
00360 }
00361 
00362 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_char(char& a) {
00363   unpack_unsigned(a, this);
00364   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_char -> " << a << endl;
00365 }
00366 
00368 
00369 // after packing a string, pack a null byte at the end 
00370 
00371 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_string(std::string a) {
00372 
00373   int nchars = a.length() + 1; // length + terminating null char
00374   const char* cstring = a.c_str();  // cstring is null terminated
00375 
00376   // pack 4 chars in each slot, and pack a null char at end
00377   unsigned nwords = (nchars - 1)/4 + 1;
00378   unsigned nwords_minusone = nwords - 1;
00379   check_size(nwords);
00380   // first copy over nwords-1 
00381   for (unsigned i=0; i < nwords_minusone; i++) {      
00382 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00383     char c[4];
00384     c[0] = cstring[i*4+3];
00385     c[1] = cstring[i*4+2];
00386     c[2] = cstring[i*4+1];
00387     c[3] = cstring[i*4];
00388     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), c, 4);
00389 #else
00390     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &(cstring[i*4]), 4);
00391 #endif
00392     pack_index++;
00393   }
00394   // now copy over the remaining chars
00395   unsigned remainder = nchars - (nwords_minusone * 4);
00396 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00397   char c[4];
00398   for (unsigned i=0; i < 4; i++) {      
00399     unsigned index = nwords*4-i-1;
00400     if (index > (nwords_minusone*4+remainder-1)) 
00401       c[i] = 0;
00402     else
00403       c[i] = cstring[index];
00404    }
00405    memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), c, 4);
00406 #else
00407   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &(cstring[nwords_minusone*4]), remainder);
00408 #endif
00409   pack_index++;
00410 
00411   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_string " << a << endl;
00412 }
00413 
00414 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_string(std::string& a) {
00415 
00416   a = "";
00417   std::string cs;
00418   char c[4];
00419   while (1) {
00420     unsigned sz = 4;
00421     bool done = false;
00422     memcpy(c, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 4);
00423     inc_unpack_index(1);
00424 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00425     char tmp;
00426     tmp = c[0]; c[0] = c[3]; c[3] = tmp;
00427     tmp = c[1]; c[1] = c[2]; c[2] = tmp;
00428 #endif
00429     // check each slot if it is the null char 
00430     if (!c[0]) {
00431       sz = 0; done = true;
00432     } else if (!c[1]) {
00433       sz = 1; done = true;
00434     } else if (!c[2]) {
00435       sz = 2; done = true;
00436     } else if (!c[3]) {
00437       sz = 3; done = true;
00438     }
00439     if (sz > 0) { 
00440       cs.assign(c, sz);
00441       a = a + cs;
00442     }
00443     if (done)
00444       break;
00445   }
00446 
00447   if (print_pack_info_int) 
00448     cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_string: " << a << endl;
00449 }
00450 
00451 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name)
00452 {
00453   pack_non_null();
00454   pack_unsigned(uvm_get_type_id(type_name), this);
00455 }
00456 
00457 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is packed.
00458 // if metadata is included, then before packing the uvm_object, pack 2
00459 // additional items:
00460 // 1) 8 bits set to 1 if the uvm_object is non-null, and set 
00461 // to 0 if uvm_object is null
00462 // 2) the string name of the uvm_object, as returned by get_type_name()
00463 
00464 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj(uvm_object* a) {
00465   if (use_metadata()) {
00466     if (a == NULL) {
00467       if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj packing null" << endl;
00468       pack_null();
00469       return;
00470     }
00471     pack_non_null();
00472     std::string s = a->get_type_name();
00473     unsigned id = uvm_get_type_id(s);
00474     pack_unsigned(id, this);
00475   }
00476   if (!a) {
00477     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACK_NULL_,"");
00478     return;
00479   }
00480   a->pack(*m_packer);
00481   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_obj " 
00482     << a->get_type_name() << endl;
00483 }
00484 
00485 void * ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header() {
00486   std::string s;
00487   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00488     if (print_pack_info_int)
00489       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00490     return NULL;
00491   }
00492   unsigned id = 0;
00493   unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00494   s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00495   void *obj = NULL;
00496   string base_class_str;
00497   if (uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) {
00498     base_class_str = "uvm_object";
00499     obj = (void *) uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00500   } else if (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s)) {
00501     base_class_str = "tlm_generic_payload";
00502     obj = uvm_factory::create_registered_class(s);
00503   }
00504   if (!obj) {
00505     char msg[1024];
00506     sprintf(msg,"Unpack %s failed. Type = %s",base_class_str.c_str(), s.c_str());
00507     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00508     return NULL;
00509   }
00510   return obj;
00511 }
00512 
00513 uvm_object * ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_uvm_obj_header() {
00514   std::string s;
00515   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00516     if (print_pack_info_int)
00517       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj_header unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00518     return NULL;
00519   }
00520   unsigned id = 0;
00521   unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00522   s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00523   uvm_object *obj = NULL;
00524   string base_class_str;
00525   if (uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) {
00526     base_class_str = "uvm_object";
00527     obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00528   } 
00529   if (!obj) {
00530     char msg[1024];
00531     sprintf(msg,"Unpack %s failed. Type = %s",base_class_str.c_str(), s.c_str());
00532     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00533     return NULL;
00534   }
00535   return obj;
00536 }
00537 
00538 
00539 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is unpacked.
00540 // metadata must have been packed during the corresponding packing
00541 // operation, as the packer allocates/creates the uvm_object from the
00542 // factory using the packed type name.
00543 // if metadata was not packed, then the packer errors out.
00544 
00545 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj(uvm_object*& a) {
00546   if (!use_metadata()) {
00547     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00548     a = 0;
00549     return;
00550   }
00551   std::string s;
00552   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00553     if (print_pack_info_int) {
00554       cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00555     }
00556     a = 0;
00557     return;
00558   }
00559   unsigned id = 0;
00560   unpack_unsigned(id, this);
00561   s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00562   uvm_object* obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00563   if (!obj) {
00564     char msg[1024];
00565     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00566     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00567     return;
00568   }
00569   obj->unpack(*m_packer);
00570   a = obj;
00571   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_obj " << endl;
00572 }
00573 
00574 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic& a) {
00575   check_size(1);
00576   if (int(a.value()) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00577     m_bits[pack_index] = 1;
00578   } else {
00579     m_bits[pack_index] = 0;
00580   }
00581   pack_index++;
00582   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_logic " << a << endl;
00583 }
00584 
00585 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic& a) {
00586   if (m_bits[unpack_index] == 1) {
00587     a = sc_dt::Log_1;
00588   } else {
00589     a = sc_dt::Log_0;
00590   }
00591   inc_unpack_index(1);
00592   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_logic " << a << endl;
00593 }
00594 
00595 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base& a) {
00596   unsigned nwords = a.size(); 
00597   check_size(nwords);
00598 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00599   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), a.m_data, nwords*4);
00600 #else
00601   // m_data is protected in OSCI
00602   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) m_bits[pack_index+i] = a.get_word(i);
00603 #endif
00604   pack_index += nwords;
00605   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_bv_base " << a << endl;
00606 }
00607 
00608 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base& a) {
00609   int nwords = a.size();
00610 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00611   memcpy(a.m_data, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), nwords*4);
00612 #else
00613   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00614   for(int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) a.set_word(i, (sc_digit)m_bits[unpack_index+i]);
00615 #endif
00616   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00617   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_bv_base " << a << endl;
00618 }
00619 
00620 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base& a) {
00621   unsigned nwords = a.size(); 
00622   check_size(nwords);
00623 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00624   memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), a.m_data, nwords*4);
00625 #else
00626   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00627   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) m_bits[pack_index+i] = a.get_word(i);
00628 #endif
00629   pack_index += nwords;
00630   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_lv_base " << a << endl;
00631 }
00632 
00633 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base& a) {
00634   int nwords = a.size();
00635 #ifdef NC_SYSTEMC
00636   memcpy(a.m_data, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), nwords*4);
00637 #else
00638   // m_data is 'protected' in OSCI
00639   for(int i = 0; i < nwords; i++) a.set_word(i, (sc_digit)m_bits[unpack_index+i]);
00640 #endif
00641   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00642   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_lv_base " << a << endl;
00643 }
00644 
00645 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base& a) {
00646 
00647   int nbits = a.length();
00648   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00649   check_size(nwords);
00650   if (nwords == 1) {
00651     int i = a.to_int();
00652     m_bits[pack_index] = i;
00653   } else {
00654     int64 i = a.to_int64();
00655     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &i, 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00656   } 
00657   pack_index += nwords;
00658   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_int_base " << a << endl;
00659 }
00660 
00661 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base& a) {
00662 
00663   int nbits = a.length(); 
00664   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00665   if (nwords == 1) {
00666     a = m_bits[unpack_index];
00667   } else {
00668     int64 i;
00669     memcpy(&i, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00670     a = i;
00671   }
00672   inc_unpack_index(nwords);  
00673   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_int_base " << a << endl;
00674 }
00675 
00676 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base& a) {
00677 
00678   int nbits = a.length();
00679   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00680   check_size(nwords);
00681   if (nwords == 1) {
00682     unsigned u = a.to_uint();
00683     m_bits[pack_index] = u;
00684   } else {
00685     uint64 u = a.to_uint64();
00686     memcpy(&(m_bits[pack_index]), &u, 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00687   } 
00688   pack_index += nwords;
00689   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_uint_base " << a << endl;
00690 }
00691 
00692 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base& a) {
00693   int nbits = a.length(); 
00694   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00695 
00696   ASSERT_N_WORDS(nwords, 3);
00697 
00698   if (nwords == 1) {
00699     a = m_bits[unpack_index];
00700   } else {
00701     uint64 u;
00702     memcpy(&u, &(m_bits[unpack_index]), 2*sizeof(unsigned));
00703     a = u;
00704   }
00705   inc_unpack_index(nwords);  
00706   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_uint_base " << a << endl;
00707 }
00708 
00709 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed& a) {
00710   unsigned nbits = a.length(); 
00711   unsigned nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00712   check_size(nwords);
00713   // the internal representation inside sc_signed is not exactly
00714   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00715   a.get_packed_rep(&(m_bits[pack_index]));
00716   pack_index += nwords;
00717   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_signed " << a << endl;
00718 }
00719 
00720 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed& a) {
00721   int nbits = a.length();
00722   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00723   // the internal representation inside sc_signed is not exactly
00724   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00725   a.set_packed_rep(&(m_bits[unpack_index]));
00726   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00727   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_signed " << a << endl;
00728 }
00729 
00730 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned& a) {
00731   unsigned nbits = a.length(); 
00732   unsigned nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00733   check_size(nwords);
00734   // the internal representation inside sc_unsigned is not exactly
00735   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00736   a.get_packed_rep(&(m_bits[pack_index]));
00737   pack_index += nwords;
00738   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::pack_sc_unsigned " << a << endl;
00739 }
00740 
00741 void ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned& a) {
00742   int nbits = a.length();
00743   int nwords = (nbits - 1)/32 + 1;
00744   // the internal representation inside sc_unsigned is not exactly
00745   // the same as the representation in m_bits, so cannot do memcpy()
00746   a.set_packed_rep(&(m_bits[unpack_index]));
00747   inc_unpack_index(nwords);
00748   if (print_pack_info_int) cerr << "ml_uvm_packer_rep_int::unpack_sc_unsigned " << a << endl;

00774     cerr << "WARNING: uvm_ml_packer_int use_metadata must be true. " 
00775       << "Ignoring attempt to set it to false" << endl;
00776     return;

00789 
00790 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (bool a) { 
00791   int i = a ? 1 : 0;
00792   pack_unsigned(i, m_rep_int);
00793   return *this;
00794 }
00795 
00796 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (bool& a) { 
00797   unsigned aa;
00798   unpack_unsigned(aa, m_rep_int); 
00799   if (aa == 0)
00800     a = false;
00801   else
00802     a = true;
00803   return *this;
00804 }

00811   return *this;\

00815   return *this; \

00870 
00871 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (uint64 a) { 
00872 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00873   // swap the two bytes before packing
00874   unsigned u[2];
00875   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00876   unsigned tmp = u[0];
00877   u[0] = u[1];
00878   u[1] = tmp;
00879   memcpy(&a, u, 8); 
00880 #endif
00881   pack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int);
00882   return *this;
00883 } 
00884 
00885 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (uint64& a) {  
00886   unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); 
00887 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00888   // the 2 words are swapped
00889   unsigned u[2];
00890   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00891   unsigned tmp = u[0];
00892   u[0] = u[1];
00893   u[1] = tmp;
00894   memcpy(&a, u, 8);
00895 #endif
00896   return *this; 
00897 }
00898 
00899 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (int64 a) { 
00900 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00901   // swap the two bytes before packing
00902   int u[2];
00903   memcpy(u, &a, 8);
00904   int tmp = u[0];
00905   u[0] = u[1];
00906   u[1] = tmp;
00907   memcpy(&a, u, 8); 
00908 #endif
00909   pack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int);
00910   return *this;
00911 }

00913 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (int64& a) {  
00914   unpack_unsigned(a, m_rep_int); 
00915 #if defined(_AIX) || defined(sparc)
00916   // the 2 words are swapped
00917   int u[2];

00920   u[0] = u[1];
00921   u[1] = tmp;
00922   memcpy(&a, u, 8);
00923 #endif
00924   return *this; 
00925 }

00985   m_rep_int->pack_##T(a);\
00986   return *this;\

01000 
01001 //template <> 
01002 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator << (const std::vector<bool>& a) {
01003   // first pack the size of the vector before packing its elements
01004   unsigned nbits = a.size();
01005   (*this) << nbits;
01006 
01007   // the bits need to be packed tightly in orer to map to
01008   // dynamic bit vector in SV or to list of bits in e. So
01009   // cannot pack each bit individually - instead map to
01010   // sc_bv and then pack sc_bv atomically
01011  
01012   if (nbits == 0) 
01013     return *this;
01014 
01015   sc_bv_base bv((int)nbits);
01016   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbits; i++) {
01017   bv[i] = a[i];
01018   }
01019   (*this) << bv;
01020   return *this;
01021 }
01022 
01023 uvm_ml_packer_int& uvm_ml_packer_int::operator >> (std::vector<bool>& a) {
01024   a.clear();
01025   unsigned nbits;
01026   // first unpack the size of the vector before unpacking its elements
01027   (*this) >> nbits;
01028 
01029   // the bits need to be unpacked tightly in orer to map from
01030   // dynamic bit vector in SV or from list of bits in e. So
01031   // cannot unpack each bit individually - instead unpack to
01032   // sc_bv atomically and then map from sc_bv
01033 
01034   if (nbits == 0)
01035     return *this;
01036  
01037   sc_bv_base bv((int)nbits);
01038   (*this) >> bv;
01039   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbits; i++) {
01040     bool b;
01041     b = bv[i].to_bool();
01042     a.push_back(b);
01043   }
01044   return *this;
01045 }
01046 
01048 
01049 
01050 void uvm_ml_packer_int::set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
01051   set_bits(v->val, v->size);
01052 }
01053 
01054 void uvm_ml_packer_int::fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(uvm_ml_packed_obj* v) {
01055   int nwords = m_rep_int->get_pack_index(); 
01056   v->size = nwords * 32;
01057   unsigned* bv = m_rep_int->get_packed_bits();
01058 
01059   // this mlupo is going over to the backplane and then onto the SV adaptor;
01060   // the SV adaptor is hardcoded to accept the max bits, hence allocate
01061   // max words here
01062   static int alloc_words = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_words();
01063   
01064   uvm_ml_packed_obj::allocate(v, alloc_words); 
01065   memcpy(v->val, bv, nwords*sizeof(unsigned));
01066 }
